overview:
Jack Karabees is the Vice President of Sales at Interneer. Prior to joining Interneer, Mr. Karabees, as Executive Vice President of Sales for Hudson Capital, a $1B+ real estate development firm, was responsible for all domestic and international sales for the company. Jack came to Hudson Capital from Katalyst Securities, where he held the position of Senior Vice President / Investment Banking.

Preceding his time at Katalyst, Jack was Senior Vice-President of Sales at eLabor, a provider of Enterprise Workforce Management software sold to the Fortune 1000. He joined eLabor in 1999 as Corporate Vice President and took on positions of increasing responsibility over the following 4 years, through eLaborâ€™s successful bi-divisional acquisitions by Microsoft and ADP.

Prior to that time, from 1987 through 1999, Mr. Karabees held the position of Vice President of Sales and Marketing at Data Net Corporation, a Florida-based high technology company. Jack served honorably in the United States Air Force. He is a member and serves on the Board of Directors of New World Angels, a South Florida angel investment fund and remains active within the high-tech investment community.

via: Interneer
